channel.title: [317] GETTING RID OF ALL CHEATCLIENTS, but have one problem look
channel.description:
ok what i did was on client side i added this in client.java [code]aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method402(MY CLIENT REQUIREMENT NUMBER);[/code]
then server side i added in server configuration file i added [code]clientrequired=MY CLIENT REQUIREMENT NUMBER[/code]
then this happens. [code]Enforcing Devolution client requirement online Connection from cpe-76-181-23-20.columbus.res.rr.com:61165 [client-1-Sam]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 0 ms] [client-1-Sam]: Invalid client! ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (cpe-76-181-23-20.columbus.res.rr.com) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (cpe-76-181-23-20.columbus.res.rr.com)[/code] can someone help me with this error? he has the client i made perfectly as above, but he still cant login.

then server side i added in server configuration file i added
